open.title: Vumatel Villages Outage | Gauteng
open.description: We are investigating reports of no connectivity affecting clients on the Vumatel Villages network in Gauteng. We are working on identifying and resolving this issue as quickly as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may be causing.
